info.title: Widgets of the eyeOS Toolkit

general.name: Widgets
general.shortDesc: Contains the widgets used in eyeOS.

info.desc: If you're working of a new application or continuing development on an existing one, you will be using eyeOS Widgets constantly. Widgets are the visual objects in an application, from a Button to an Image or a Sortable Table and they considerably ease the development of any application.
